column1: # 1. A-PREFIXED GROUPS - Customer Segment Specific Interest Rates
# A00000000001 Group - Premium Customer Segment with Low Interest Rates

column2: Premium customer segment with preferred interest rates. Terms subject to creditworthiness and account standing. Variable APR based on Prime Rate plus margin.
Premium customer segment with promotional rate for first 6 months. After promotional period, standard variable APR applies based on creditworthiness.

column1: # A00000000002 Group - Standard Customer Segment with Zero Interest Promotional Offers

column2: Standard customer segment eligible for zero-interest promotional periods. Promotional rate applies to qualifying transactions during offer period.
Standard customer segment post-promotional period. Standard variable APR applies based on Prime Rate plus applicable margin.

column1: # A00000000003 Group - High-Risk Customer Segment with Higher Rates

column2: Higher risk customer segment with elevated interest rates reflecting increased credit risk. Rate subject to periodic review and adjustment.
Higher risk customer segment with rate adjustment based on payment history and credit utilization patterns.

column1: # A00000000004 Group - Business Customer Segment with Commercial Rates

column2: Business customer segment with commercial interest rate structure. Rates may vary based on business credit profile and relationship.
Business customer segment with quarterly rate review. Rate adjustments based on market conditions and business performance metrics.

column1: # A00000000005 Group - Student Customer Segment with Educational Benefits

column2: Student customer segment with educational interest rate benefits. Special terms available for qualifying educational expenses.

column1: # A00000000006 Group - Senior Customer Segment with Age-Based Benefits

column2: Senior customer segment with age-based interest rate benefits. Preferential rates for customers 65 and older with qualifying accounts.
Senior customer segment with enhanced benefits. Additional rate reductions available for customers with qualifying direct deposits.

column1: # A00000000007 Group - Military Customer Segment with Service Member Benefits

column2: Military customer segment with service member interest rate benefits. Special terms available for active duty and veteran customers.

column1: # 2. DEFAULT GROUP - Standard Disclosure Terms for General Population
# DEFAULT Group with Various Interest Rate Scenarios

column2: Default disclosure group with standard variable APR. Interest rate determined by creditworthiness, payment history, and current market conditions.
Default disclosure group with promotional rate adjustment. Limited time offer for qualifying customers with excellent payment history.
Default disclosure group with market-based rate adjustment. Rate changes reflect current Prime Rate movements and competitive positioning.
Default disclosure group with credit-based tiered pricing. Rate varies based on individual credit score and account utilization patterns.
Default disclosure group with zero promotional rate. Special offer for balance transfers and new purchase transactions.
Default disclosure group with standard terms resumption. Return to variable APR after promotional period expiration.
Default disclosure group with annual rate review adjustment. Rate modification based on portfolio performance and risk assessment.
Default disclosure group with competitive rate positioning. Rate adjustments to maintain market competitiveness.
Default disclosure group with relationship-based pricing. Enhanced rates available for customers with multiple account relationships.
Default disclosure group with seasonal promotional rates. Limited time offers during peak spending seasons.
Default disclosure group with standard rate restoration. Return to base variable APR after promotional period conclusion.
Default disclosure group with loyalty program benefits. Rate reductions available for long-term customers with excellent standing.
Default disclosure group with payment behavior incentives. Rate benefits for customers maintaining consistent payment patterns.
Default disclosure group with zero interest holiday promotion. Special rates for qualifying purchases during promotional windows.

column2: Zero APR promotional offer for qualified customers. Promotional rate applies to qualifying transactions for specified period.
Zero APR promotional offer for balance transfers. Special terms for customers transferring balances from other financial institutions.
Zero APR promotional offer for new purchases. Special promotional rate for new account holders during introductory period.
Zero APR promotional offer for seasonal campaigns. Limited time offers during holiday and peak spending periods.
Zero APR promotional offer for customer retention. Special rates offered to retain high-value customers considering account closure.
Zero APR promotional offer for credit building. Special terms for customers working to establish or improve credit history.
Zero APR promotional offer for large purchases. Special financing terms for customers making significant qualifying purchases.
Zero APR promotional offer for loyalty program members. Enhanced benefits for customers participating in rewards programs.
Zero APR promotional offer for referral incentives. Special rates for customers referred by existing account holders.
Zero APR promotional offer for account upgrade incentives. Special terms for customers upgrading to premium account types.
Zero APR promotional offer for partnership campaigns. Special rates through strategic partner relationships and affiliations.

Zero APR promotional offer for emergency financing. Special terms for customers experiencing temporary financial hardship.
Zero APR promotional offer for business startup financing. Special rates for new business customers establishing commercial relationships.
Zero APR promotional offer for debt consolidation. Special terms for customers consolidating high-interest debt from other sources.
Zero APR promotional offer for home improvement financing. Special rates for customers financing qualifying home renovation projects.

column1: # 4. EDGE CASE TESTING - BigDecimal Precision Boundary Validation

column2: Minimum interest rate precision testing for BigDecimal validation. Rate represents 0.01% annual percentage rate.
Minimum interest rate precision boundary testing. Validates DECIMAL(5,4) column precision handling at lowest acceptable rate.
Low precision interest rate testing for financial calculation accuracy. Ensures proper handling of fractional percentage rates.

column1: # Medium Precision Testing - Standard Rate Ranges

column2: Medium precision interest rate testing for typical customer rates. Represents 10.00% annual percentage rate for validation.
Medium precision interest rate testing at 15.00% APR. Validates typical credit card interest rate calculations and precision.
Medium precision interest rate testing at 20.00% APR. Tests BigDecimal arithmetic for higher standard interest rate ranges.
Medium precision interest rate testing at 25.00% APR. Validates precision maintenance in higher interest rate calculations.

column1: # High Precision Testing - Near Maximum Rates

column2: High precision interest rate testing approaching maximum allowed rate. Validates DECIMAL(5,4) handling near upper bounds.
High precision interest rate testing at 95.00% APR. Tests BigDecimal precision at elevated interest rate levels.
High precision interest rate testing near maximum precision boundary. Validates proper handling of extreme rate scenarios.
Maximum interest rate precision testing for DECIMAL(5,4) boundary validation. Rate represents 999.99% theoretical maximum.
Maximum precision boundary testing for BigDecimal arithmetic validation. Ensures proper handling at column precision limits.
Near-maximum precision testing for financial calculation accuracy. Validates BigDecimal operations near upper precision bounds.

column1: # 5. TEMPORAL TESTING - Effective Date Scenarios for Rate Change Tracking

column2: Historical interest rate testing for temporal validation. Effective date in past for testing date-based rate lookups.
Historical interest rate testing with quarterly changes. Validates temporal rate tracking and historical rate retrieval.
Historical interest rate testing with mid-year adjustments. Tests effective date processing for rate change scenarios.
Future interest rate testing for scheduled rate changes. Effective date in future for testing pending rate implementations.
Future interest rate testing for planned promotional rates. Validates future-dated rate schedules and activation processing.
Future interest rate testing for market-based adjustments. Tests scheduled rate changes based on projected market conditions.

column1: # Current Date Testing - Various Time Zones and Precision

column2: Current date interest rate testing for immediate activation. Effective date set to current timestamp for real-time processing.
Current date interest rate testing with timezone handling. Validates proper UTC timestamp processing and conversion.
Current date interest rate testing with millisecond precision. Tests timestamp precision handling in rate effective calculations.

column1: # 6. BUSINESS RULE VALIDATION - Comprehensive Disclosure Text Scenarios

column2: Extended disclosure text for comprehensive compliance testing and validation of TEXT column storage capacity. This disclosure includes detailed terms and conditions for interest rate application, including but not limited to: rate calculation methodology, compounding frequency, payment allocation procedures, rate change notification requirements, and customer rights regarding rate modifications. Additional terms cover promotional rate expiration, penalty rate application, and dispute resolution procedures.
Disclosure text with special characters for validation: 'quotes', "double quotes", & ampersands, % percentages, $dollar signs, and (parentheses) for comprehensive text processing validation.
Disclosure text with accented characters: café, résumé, naïve, and señor for international customer support validation.
Minimal disclosure text.

Batch processing test record 4 for Spring Batch chunk-oriented processing validation and FlatFileItemReader testing.

Foreign key relationship testing for accounts table integration. Validates disclosure group assignment to customer accounts.
Foreign key relationship testing for referential integrity. Ensures proper cascade behavior and constraint enforcement.
Foreign key relationship testing for bulk operations. Validates batch processing with foreign key constraint checking.
